entries.title: Indiana Republicans face blessing and curse in jockeying for 2024 Senate seat
entries.description: A game of political musical chairs is unfolding among Republicans after Indiana Sen. Mike Braun announced he plans to run for governor rather than reelection in 2024

entries.title: Tyre Nichols 'a human pinata' for cops, attorney says after viewing bodycam footage
entries.description: The video footage of Tyre Nichols' interaction with five Memphis police officers is "appalling," Ben Crump, attorney for the Nichols family, said.

entries.title: 2 in critical condition after school shooting
entries.description: Three people are in the hospital after a shooting at a Des Moines, Iowa, school Monday afternoon, according to police.

entries.title: Monterey Park mass shooting live updates: Death toll rises to 11
entries.description: At least 10 people were killed and 10 others were injured on Saturday night when a gunman opened fire at a crowded dance studio in Monterey Park, California.

entries.title: US proposes once-a-year COVID shots for most Americans
entries.description: Health officials want to make COVID vaccinations more like the annual flu shot.

entries.title: $24M worth of cocaine seized near Puerto Rico; 3 arrested
entries.description: It was seized off a speedboat trying to reach Puerto Rico’s southeast coast.

entries.title: Woman lands new job after resume cake goes viral on LinkedIn
entries.description: The delivery transaction turned into a real-life mentorship and friendship.

entries.title: WATCH:  Thirsty koala cozies up next to decorative doppelgänger
entries.description: An Australian family received an unexpected visitor in their backyard: a thirsty koala nestled up next to its decorative doppelgänger.

entries.title: WATCH:  Environmentalists concerned as trash builds up in Balkan river
entries.description: Environmental campaigners in Bosnia and Herzegovina are sounding the alarm after a large buildup of garbage turned parts of the Drina River into a floating dump.

entries.title: Elon Musk testifies in 2nd day of Tesla tweet trial
entries.description: The trial hinges on the question of whether two tweets damaged shareholders.

entries.title: Man charged with opening fire at picnic found dead in jail
entries.description: A Milwaukee man was accused of killing two people and wounding three others.

entries.title: Ancient fresco among 60 treasures returned to Italy from US
entries.description: The fresco is from a city destroyed along with Pompeii by the Vesuvius eruption.

entries.title: Hazing suit at Bowling Green ends with nearly $3M settlement
entries.description: The family of a student who died from alcohol poisoning while pledging a fraternity will receive nearly $3 million from Bowling Green State University to settle its hazing-related lawsuit

entries.title: Is tipping getting out of control? Many consumers say yes
entries.description: There’s a silent frustration brewing over the ever-presence of tipping.

entries.title: 2 Michigan girls survive after car with dad goes into lake
entries.description: The two sisters escaped but their father was dead when the vehicle was located.

entries.title: Former top FBI official arrested over ties to Russian oligarch
entries.description: A former top FBI official in New York has been arrested over his ties to a Russian oligarch, law enforcement sources told ABC News Monday.

entries.title: South Dakota tribe: Storm deaths 'could have been prevented'
entries.description: December storms buried their reservation in snow and left them stranded.

entries.title: Biden orders flags to half-staff after Monterey Park shooting
entries.description: Flags will remain at half-staff "as a mark of respect for the victims of the senseless acts of violence” until Thursday at sundown, Biden’s proclamation said

entries.title: Rep. Gallego announces 2024 bid for Kyrsten Sinema's Senate seat
entries.description: Arizona Democratic Rep. Ruben Gallego announced he is launching a Senate run for independent Sen. Kyrsten Sinema's seat.

entries.title: US ends probe into Ford SUV exhaust issues without a recall
entries.description: The investigation determined the SUVs don’t emit high levels of carbon monoxide.

entries.title: Spotify latest tech name to cut jobs, axes 6% of workforce
entries.description: CEO Daniel Ek announced the restructuring in a message to employees.

entries.title: Investigation into Beirut's massive 2020 port blast resumes
entries.description: The judge investigating the massive blast resumed work after a 13-month halt.

entries.title: Officials: 396 Haitian migrants detained near Bahamas
entries.description: Thousands are fleeing Haiti's spike in gang violence and political instability.

entries.title: Man who disarmed Monterey Park shooter speaks out: 'Something came over me'
entries.description: The man who disarmed the Monterey Park mass shooter spoke to ABC News on "Good Morning America."

entries.title: Bribery trial of ex-Ohio House speaker to begin in earnest
entries.description: Federal prosecutors believe it is the largest corruption case in state history.

entries.title: Alex Murdaugh goes on trial in 2021 killings of wife, son
entries.description: Disgraced South Carolina lawyer Alex Murdaugh is about to put his fate before a small-town jury

entries.title: Lavrov says West prevented negotiations to end Ukraine war
entries.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov says Moscow was willing to negotiate with Ukraine in the early months of the war but the United States and other Western nations advised Kyiv against it

entries.title: 2023 'Doomsday Clock' announcement: What to know
entries.description: Scientists will reveal on Tuesday how close humanity is to armageddon with its latest edition of the "Doomsday Clock."

entries.title: Plastic surgeon among 4 charged in alleged fake COVID vaccine card scheme
entries.description: A plastic surgeon, his neighbor and two of his employees are alleged to have ran a fake vaccination records scheme through the doctor's Salt Lake City-area practice.

entries.title: Rep. Katherine Clark's daughter is charged in police assault
entries.description: The daughter of Massachusetts Democratic congresswoman Katherine Clark was arrested during a protest on Boston Common and later charged with assault after a police officer was injured

entries.title: WATCH:  Giant seal returns to sea after visiting Australian beach town
entries.description: An enormous seal was spotted roaming around an Australian beach town, visiting a local gas station and surprising bystanders, before returning to the sea.

entries.title: WATCH:  'Toadzilla' shocks park rangers in Australia
entries.description: Australian park rangers were "shocked" to find a giant cane toad in the Conway National Park rainforest. They removed the 6-pound amphibian from the park, as the species—is a threat to the ecosystem.

entries.title: Military probing whether cancers linked to nuclear silo work
entries.description: Nine military officers who had worked decades ago at a nuclear missile base in Montana have been diagnosed with blood cancer

entries.title: Asian community reeling after Lunar New Year shooting
entries.description: A joyful kickoff to the first Lunar New Year celebration in Monterey Park since before the pandemic was marred by tragedy after a gunman opened fire inside a dance hall, killing 10 people in the majority Asian city near Los Angeles
